pizzaShortIntro: Local, fresh, and a delight for all senses
fireAndDough: The story of Fire and Dough
fireAndDoughText: The dough is carefully made by hand. It rests for at least 48 hours before being topped with the finest ingredients, which makes it particularly digestible. We use only the freshest, highest-quality ingredients and bake our pizzas in a 400-degree oven for an unforgettable taste.
ourPizzasText: Our pizzas are unique and diverse. We offer a wide selection of classic and innovative pizzas that delight every palate. Whether vegetarian, vegan, or with meat - we have something for every taste.
ourValuesText: We place great value on quality, sustainability, and regionality. Our products come from local producers and are free from artificial additives. We are committed to the conscious handling of food and want to contribute to a healthy and sustainable diet.
contactUsText: Do you have questions or suggestions? We look forward to your feedback and are happy to assist you. Contact us via email, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
